BodyName: Committee on Consumer Affairs and Business Licensing

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring sight-seeing bus operators to submit operating plans to the department of transportation
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring sight-seeing bus operators to submit operating plans to the DOT.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to limiting the number of sightseeing bus licenses
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Limiting the number of sightseeing bus licenses.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to strengthening the licensing requirements in the sight-seeing bus industry
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Strengthening the licensing requirements in the sight-seeing bus industry.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring double decker sight-seeing buses to have at least one employee present on the upper level at all times when passengers are present.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring double decker sight-seeing buses to have one owner representative present on the upper level at all times when passengers are present.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring double decker sight-seeing buses to have at least one employee present on the upper level at all times when passengers are present.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Amendment Proposed by Comm
Items.MatterName: Requiring double decker sight-seeing buses to have one owner representative present on the upper level at all times when passengers are present.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring double decker sight-seeing buses to have at least one employee present on the upper level at all times when passengers are present.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring double decker sight-seeing buses to have one owner representative present on the upper level at all times when passengers are present.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring sight-seeing bus operators to submit operating plans to the department of transportation
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring sight-seeing bus operators to submit operating plans to the DOT.

Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Limiting the number of sightseeing bus licenses.

Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
